title: Cidered pork stew with light herb dumplings
ingredients: ['1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '450 g (1 lb) lean boneless pork, cut into 2.5 cm (1 in) chunks', '2 carrots, cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '2 celery sticks, sliced', '2 leeks, sliced', '2 bay leaves', '2 tbsp finely shredded fresh sage or 1 tsp dried sage', '300 ml (10 fl oz) dry cider', '300 ml (10 fl oz) pork or chicken stock, preferably home-made', '1 tbsp Dijon mustard', '675 g (1½ lb) potatoes, peeled and cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '225 g (8 oz) swede, cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', 'salt and pepper', 'Fresh herb dumplings', '100 g (3½ oz) fresh white breadcrumbs', '55 g (2 oz) self-raising flour', '½ tsp baking powder', '3 tbsp snipped fresh chives', '3 tbsp chopped parsley', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '3 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '1 tbsp sunflower oil']
